section.heading: Tax abatements for homeowners in enterprise zones — Requirements for tax abatement.
section.text: In order for a property to be eligible for a tax abatement under § 47-858.03 or § 47-858.04, an owner must:

para.text: Submit an application to the Mayor requesting certification of the property and rehabilitation as eligible for the tax abatement; and
Receive the Mayor’s certification of the application and the tax abatement.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 47-858.03 and § 47-858.04.
